main_definition: Relating to or involving graphics, visual representation of information.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Involving the use of diagrams and images for illustration or explanation
meanings_and_examples.example: The graphical interface of the software makes it easy to navigate.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Concerning or involving graphics, charts, or pictorial representation
meanings_and_examples.example: Graphical data can be displayed using pie charts or bar graphs for better understanding.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Describing an approach that emphasizes the importance of visual elements in conveying information
meanings_and_examples.example: The graphical design of this report makes it more engaging and easier to read.
